title: The Unexpected Heroism of Bob Miller
summary: Bob Miller, a 61-year-old quilter and guide, discovers his mysterious superpowers and saves his town from an unexpected disaster.
summaryGerman: Bob Miller, ein 61-jähriger Quilter und Führer, entdeckt seine mysteriösen Superkräfte und rettet seine Stadt vor einer unerwarteten Katastrophe.
summaryDutch: Bob Miller, een 61-jarige quilter en gids, ontdekt zijn mysterieuze superkrachten en redt zijn stad van een onverwachte ramp.
summaryFrench: Bob Miller, un quilteur et guide de 61 ans, découvre ses superpouvoirs mystérieux et sauve sa ville d'une catastrophe inattendue.

story.text: Bob Miller starts his day with his usual morning walk, feeling unusually energetic. He stumbles upon a glowing rock in the park which imbues him with superpowers.
Feeling euphoric and powerful, Bob explores his new found strength and ability to manipulate fabric, his mood romantic as he contemplates the possible good he can do.
Bob prevents a major accident at a local festival by creating a massive quilt barrier in seconds, displaying his power publicly for the first time.
News of his deeds spreads. While many praise him, the mood turns eerie as some question the source of his powers.
Bob uses his abilities to guide lost hikers back to safety, his peaceful nature calming those around him.
Villains seeking to exploit Bob’s powers kidnap him, demanding he use his abilities for evil. These events escalate to an epic showdown.
Bob cleverly uses his skills to escape and subdue the villains, with the help of his quilting group. The town celebrates their new hero, feeling deeply happy and secure.

ending: As the sun set that Sunday evening, Bob, surrounded by friends and family, realized that anyone can be a hero in their own unique way.
moral: Real heroes come in all ages, and often from the most unexpected places.
